song.englishname: Lord You've Been Good To Me (with Martin Smith)

english.segment1: Lord you've been good to me. All my life, all my life. Your loving kindness never fails. I will remember. All you have done. Bring from my heart. Thanksgiving songs
english.segment2: New every morning is your love. Filled with compassion from above. Grace and forgiveness full and free. Lord you've been good to me
english.segment3: So may each breath I take. Be for you Lord, only you. Giving you back the life I owe. Love so amazing. Mercy so free. Lord you've been good. So good to me
english.segment4: Graham Kendrick. Copyright Â© 2001 Make Way Music
